state.code:
flowchart TD
    begin[程序开始] -->init(初始化)
    init --> |每隔10ms|time0[Time0中断程序]
    init --> main[主程序循环]
    init --> |每隔2ms|time1[Time1中断程序]
    main --> ding{{是否倒计时结束}}
    ding --> |yes|dingding[响铃]
    dingding --> main
    ding -->|no|main
    subgraph Time0中断程序
    time0 --> ks{{是否有按键按下}}
    ks --> |yes| key2[判断按键代码]
    key2 --> |按键编号|operate[执行对应操作]
    end
    ks -->|no| main
    operate --> main
    subgraph Time1中断程序
    time1 --> judge{{判断当前计时器状态}}
    judge -->|处于暂停状态|if10{{是否已经等待十秒}} 
    if10 -->|yes| wait[息屏]
     if10-->|no|display
    judge --> if1{{有没有到1s}}
    if1 -->|no|display
    if1 -->|yes|newflash[刷新数字显示]
    newflash --> display
    end
    wait --> main
    display --> main

flowchart TD
    begin[程序开始] -->init(初始化)
    init --> |每隔10ms|time0[Time0中断程序]

    init --> |每隔2ms|time1[Time1中断程序]

                        Time1停止工作`"]
     if10-->|no|display
    judge --> if1{{有没有到1s}}
    if1 -->|no|display
    if1 -->|yes|newflash[刷新数字显示]
    newflash --> display
    end
    wait --> main
    display --> main

    if10 -->|yes| wait["`息屏
    Time1停止工作`"]
